Description: Homepage parallax scrolling is very slow on mobile devices
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Visit homepage on mobile device 2. Scroll through scenes 3. Observe scrolling performance
Actual Result: Scrolling stutters and is very slow, especially on scene transitions

Description: Login button styling is inconsistent with overall design
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Go to login page 2. Observe login button appearance
Expected Result: Login button matches site design theme
Actual Result: Button has different colors and doesn't match other buttons on site

Description: AI chat responses are not loading at all
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open chat interface 2. Type a question 3. Click send 4. Wait for response
Expected Result: AI should provide a response within 10 seconds
Actual Result: No response appears, chat seems broken

Steps to Reproduce: Parallax scrolling stutters on scene transitions
Expected Result: 1. Visit homepage 2. Scroll slowly through scenes 3. Observe transitions between scenes 1-2, 2-3, etc.
Device/Browser: Noticeable stuttering and frame drops during scene transitions
